Price: $19.95 ADD TO CART 100% Money back guaranteed Document provided by... www.paloalto.com (Learn more...) Palo Alto Software is the worldwide leader in business plan software and marketing plan software. The company was founded in 1983 by Tim Berry, a business planning expert, Stanford MBA, and co-founder of Borland International with a long history of technology sector leadership in the Silicon Valley. Despite the company's name, Palo Alto Software is now headquartered in Eugene, Oregon, with international offices in London and Ireland. About This Document The Franchise Sub Shop marketing plan lays out comprehensive, implementable marketing activities for a national franchise sub sandwich quick-service restaurant. Stats Type: Acrobat PDF Size: 565 kb Pages: 23 Views: 261 Posted: 06/09/10 Categories DocStore > Business Resources > Sales&Marketing Tags Franchise Sub Shop , restaurant , sandwich , quick service , sub sandwich , fast food , food , start-up , startup , financing , franchise , Italian , marketing plan , start-up Tweet Embed Email Sandwich Restaurant Marketing Plan Get instant, risk free, access to the full version now!
